com.sailthru.mobile.sdk.interfaces

Interface ContentIntentBuilder


  • public ContentIntentBuilder

    Implement this interface to build a custom intent to be executed when the notification is tapped Note: Direct to URI notifications using the _u parameter will never call {@link #build(Context, Bundle)}

    Example of usage directing users to SaleActivity when a notification has the custom field special_price defined.

    Add your implementation using {@link NotificationConfig#setContentIntentBuilder(ContentIntentBuilder)}

    • Method Detail

      • build

        @Nullable
android.app.PendingIntent build(@NotNull
                                          android.content.Context context,
                                          @NotNull
                                          android.os.Bundle bundle)

        This method is called to build the intent to be executed when the notification is tapped Please set your own ContentIntentBuilder using NotificationConfig.setContentIntentBuilder

        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        bundle - message data as String key/value pairs.
        Returns:
        a PendingIntent to be executed or null to keep the default behaviour from SailthruMobile
        See Also:
        NotificationConfig.setContentIntentBuilder
